/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. In the distance, a large building with a distinctive red roof stands out, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette of grays and browns. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. On either side of the street, trees and lampposts line the way, leading the viewer's eye towards the horizon. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the textures and details of the cityscape.
